menu

Basic Income Guarantee

A basic income (also called basic income guarantee, Citizen's Income, unconditional basic income, universal basic income (UBI), or universal demogrant) is a form of social security in which all citizens or residents of a country receive a regular, unconditional sum of money, either from a government or some other public institution, independent of any other income.

How to get BIG?
  • person_add Registration keyboard_arrow_down
    Leave your email at http://big.foundation. Wait for email and fill in the form with your social profile and your Ethereum wallet. (Don't use Jaxx, Coinbase and any exchanges wallet. We recommend to use MEW, MetaMask or ImToken)
  • verified_user Verification keyboard_arrow_down
    Wait while our manager contact you and verify your social profile. He'll give you a smart contract address.
  • account_balance_wallet Payment keyboard_arrow_down
    To verify your wallet send a minimum of 0.01 ETH to smart contract address. You can send any sum you want and you'll get more BIG tokens (1 BIG = 0.01 ETH)
  • card_giftcard Get bonus keyboard_arrow_down
    You can buy as many tokens as you want. You can get bonus:
    • Bonus of 10% for sum from 100 ETH;
    • Bonus of 20% for sum from 500 ETH;
    • Bonus of 30% for sum from 1,000 ETH;
    • Bonus of 40% for sum from 5,000 ETH;
    • Bonus of 50% for sum from 10,000 ETH.
  • fingerprint Get BIG keyboard_arrow_down
    After the payment you'll start to get 1 BIG token every day for free forever!
